original_text: And Phinehas the son of Eleazar was the chief officer over them in time past; the Lord was with him.
korean_text: 여호와께서 함께 하신 엘르아살의 아들 비느하스가 옛적에 그의 무리를 거느렸고

sentences.original_text: And Phinehas the son of Eleazar was the chief officer over them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 엘르아살의 아들 비느하스는 그들의 관원장이었고
